CustomField.description: This is the field where the User will enter the Quantity - which in turn will add to the aggregate Quantity on the Quote line. e.g. for a Product with Unit of Measure as Turbines (WTG), this filed will have the number of Turbines and the MWp_Quantity__c (which is going to be renamed to MW_Quantity__c later) will have the MW for the WTG plant
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the field where the User will enter the Quantity - which in turn will add to the aggregate Quantity on the Quote line. e.g. for a Product with Unit of Measure as Turbines (WTG), this filed will have the number of Turbines and the MWp_Quantity__c (which is going to be renamed to MW_Quantity__c later) will have the MW for the WTG plant
CustomField.label: Quote Line Quantity
